meta.title: From GOOD LUCK to BABE
meta.author: Sandy Weisz and Mao Reynolds
meta.message: We're celebrating Pride Month with Raddles inspired by LGBTQ+ anthems. "Good Luck, Babe!" is Chappell Roan's breakout single, a catchy pop anthem about the cost of not facing your true identity. _"You'd have to stop the world just to stop the feeling,"_ she sings.
